verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The Lord love the gates of Zion.
He dwells in her courts of praise,
In them are stirring.
The songs of deliverance.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Walk all around her,
Go through her palaces.
Inscribe what you see
In the hearts of your children.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
My lines are in pleasant places,
Oh say to the Lord,
My heritage is beautiful to me,
Is beautiful to me.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Glorious things are spoken.
Oh city of our great King,
God in his Temple
Is known as a stronghold.
